00015     CalorimeterSD::CalorimeterSD(G4String name, G4String theCollectionName, int subdetID, DetectorID* detID) :
00016             G4VSensitiveDetector(name), hitsCollection_(0), subdet_(subdetID), detID_(detID) {
00017 
00018         // Add the collection name to vector of names.
00019         this->collectionName.push_back(theCollectionName);
00020 
00021         // Register this SD with the manager.
00022         G4SDManager::GetSDMpointer()->AddNewDetector(this);
00023 
00024         // Set the subdet ID as it will always be the same for every hit.
00025         detID_->setFieldValue("subdet", subdet_);
00026     }
00027 
00028     CalorimeterSD::~CalorimeterSD() {
00029         delete detID_;
00030     }
00031 
00032     void CalorimeterSD::Initialize(G4HCofThisEvent* hce) {
00033 
00034         // Setup hits collection and the HC ID.
00035         hitsCollection_ = new G4CalorimeterHitsCollection(SensitiveDetectorName, collectionName[0]);
00036         G4int hcID = G4SDManager::GetSDMpointer()->GetCollectionID(collectionName[0]);
00037         hce->AddHitsCollection(hcID, hitsCollection_);
00038     }
00039 
00040     G4bool CalorimeterSD::ProcessHits(G4Step* aStep, G4TouchableHistory*) {
00041 
00042         // Determine if current particle of this step is a Geantino.
00043         G4ParticleDefinition* pdef = aStep->GetTrack()->GetDefinition();
00044         bool isGeantino = false;
00045         if (pdef == G4Geantino::Definition() || pdef == G4ChargedGeantino::Definition()) {
00046             isGeantino = true;
00047         }
00048 
00049         // Get the edep from the step.
00050         G4double edep = aStep->GetTotalEnergyDeposit();
00051 
00052         // Skip steps with no energy dep which come from non-Geantino particles.
00053         if (edep == 0.0 && !isGeantino) {
00054             if (verboseLevel > 2) {
00055                 std::cout << "CalorimeterSD skipping step with zero edep." << std::endl << std::endl;
00056             }
00057             return false;
00058         }
00059 
00060         // Create a new hit object using the ROOT event.
00061         //SimCalorimeterHit* simCalorimeterHit =
00062         //        (SimCalorimeterHit*) currentEvent->addObject(collectionName[0]);
00063         G4CalorimeterHit* hit = new G4CalorimeterHit(/*simCalorimeterHit*/);
00064 
00065         // Set the edep.
00066         hit->setEdep(edep);
00067 
00068         // Set the position.
00069         G4StepPoint* prePoint = aStep->GetPreStepPoint();
00070         G4StepPoint* postPoint = aStep->GetPostStepPoint();
00071         G4ThreeVector position = 0.5 * (prePoint->GetPosition() + postPoint->GetPosition());
00072         G4ThreeVector volumePosition = aStep->GetPreStepPoint()->GetTouchableHandle()->GetHistory()->GetTopTransform().Inverse().TransformPoint(G4ThreeVector());
00073         hit->setPosition(position[0], position[1], volumePosition.z());
00074 
00075         // Set the global time.
00076         hit->setTime(aStep->GetTrack()->GetGlobalTime());
00077 
00078         // Set the ID on the hit.
00079         int layerNumber = prePoint->GetTouchableHandle()->GetHistory()->GetVolume(layerDepth_)->GetCopyNo();
00080         detID_->setFieldValue(1, layerNumber);
00081         hit->setID(detID_->pack());
00082 
00083         // Set the track ID on the hit.
00084         hit->setTrackID(aStep->GetTrack()->GetTrackID());
00085 
00086         // Set the PDG code from the track.
00087         hit->setPdgCode(aStep->GetTrack()->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding());
00088 
00089         if (this->verboseLevel > 2) {
00090             std::cout << "Created new SimCalorimeterHit in detector " << this->GetName() << " with subdet ID " << subdet_ << " and layer " << layerNumber << " ..." << std::endl;
00091             hit->Print();
00092             std::cout << std::endl;
00093         }
00094 
00095         hitsCollection_->insert(hit);
00096 
00097         return true;
00098     }
00099 
00100     void CalorimeterSD::EndOfEvent(G4HCofThisEvent*) {
00101         // Print number of hits.
00102         if (this->verboseLevel > 0) {
00103             std::cout << GetName() << " had " << hitsCollection_->entries() << " hits in event" << std::endl;
00104         }
00105 
00106         // Print each hit in hits collection.
00107         if (this->verboseLevel > 1) {
00108             for (unsigned iHit = 0; iHit < hitsCollection_->GetSize(); iHit++) {
00109                 (*hitsCollection_)[iHit]->Print();
00110             }
00111         }
00112     }
00113 
00114 }
